programme.desc: Johnny Utah, um jovem agente do FBI, se infiltra em crculos de surf para desmascarar uma gangue de ladres que, como marca registrada, usam mscaras de presidentes dos Estados Unidos durante seus golpes.

programme.title: Famlia de Policiais II: Uma Quebra de Confiana, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: O inspetor Paul Fein volta sua antiga vizinhana para desvendar um crime: a mfia russa suspeita de ter assassinado um padre. Desta vez, ele precisa enfrentar fantasmas do passado, sob o risco de ter a sua famlia na mira dos bandidos.

programme.title: Malcolm X, (1993, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: O lder afro-americano Malcolm X tem o pai assassinado pela Klu Klux Klan e sua me internada por insanidade. Preso aos 20 anos de idade, Malcolm se converte ao islamismo e passa a pregar seus ideais.

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Stillwell um f de Bruce Lee e jovem aprendiz de artes marciais. Aps seu pai negar participar de uma gangue de criminosos, eles se mudam de cidade, onde Jason encontrar problemas.

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Os mtodos incomuns de um policial de Hong Kong levam ao seu rebaixamento para o trnsito, apesar do sucesso. Enquanto isso, um antigo inimigo sai da priso em busca de vingana.

programme.title: Cidade do dio, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Roy um ladro aposentado que se une ao seu irmo e dois cmplices para um ltimo trabalho, assaltar uma joalheria. O assalto d certo, mas ele trado por um dos bandidos, que mata seu irmo. Roy agora quer se vingar do antigo comparsa.

programme.title: Os Dois Super-Tiras em Miami, (1985, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Doug Bennet e Steve Forrest permaneceram amigos, mesmo depois que Steve deixou o FBI. Mas, para reuni-los, est Garret, um perigoso ex-presidirio em cujo caso os dois policiais trabalharam juntos.

programme.title: O Que Fazer?, (2014, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Depois de saber que s tem 90 minutos de vida, por conta de um aneurisma no crebro, um homem infeliz quer fazer as pazes com todos aqueles que foram magoados por ele.

programme.title: O Fsico, (2014, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: No sculo XI, um rfo carente viaja para a Prsia para estudar medicina com um renomado curandeiro.

programme.title: Lute Por Sua Vida, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme focado em um grupo de pessoas obcecadas por um livro de autoajuda. medida que o livro se torna mais popular, ele afeta uma estranha variedade de personagens. Suas vidas se cruzam, gerando mudanas que duraro para sempre.

programme.title: Em Busca de um Milagre, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: O mundo do doutor Luke Matthew desaba quando ele perde o amor de sua vida e se torna pai na mesma noite. Quando ele contrata Sage como a nova bab, os dois comeam a perceber que a melhor forma de remdio deixar ir.

programme.title: Davi e Golias, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: No cruzamento de dois grandes imprios, um simples pastor chamado David se transforma em um poderoso guerreiro e enfrenta um gigante aterrorizante. Uma das batalhas mais lendrias da histria recontada em um conto de coragem e f.

programme.title: Atormentado pelo passado, (2020, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Um homem luta para chegar a um acordo com a insegurana paralisante e os resduos de seu abuso sexual na infncia nas mos de um padre confivel e respeitado.

programme.title: O Chamado de Deus, (2015, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Uma jovem problemtica que trabalha em um call center de oraes faz a diferena na vida de outras pessoas, o que a faz lidar com seu passado conturbado quando finalmente um dia percebe a f.

programme.title: A rvore Da Vida, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: A histria de uma famlia em Waco, Texas, em 1956. O filho mais velho testemunha a perda da inocncia e luta com os ensinamentos conflitantes de seus pais.

programme.title: O Melhor Ladro do Mundo, (2005, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Depois que o marido tem um derrame, Sue Zaidman passa a ser a nica provedora de sua famlia. Ela enfrenta uma fase difcil e turbulenta, e tem que se impor para lidar com os filhos e manter-se firme apesar das adversidades.

programme.title: Naruto: Uma Derrota Digna
programme.desc: Hinata enfrenta Neji, mas ele ataca o ponto de presso dela com Byakugan (olhos brancos). O fluxo de chakra de Hinata para, e ela quase perde a conscincia. Ela encontra coragem ao lembrar como Naruto no desiste de nenhuma dificuldade.

programme.desc: No nono combate, Gaara finalmente aparece e seu oponente Lee, um especialista em taijutsu (tcnica fsica). Lee usa esta poderosa tcnica contra Gaara, que manipula areia de sua cabaa. Ento, a Armadura de Areia de Gaara finalmente se solta...

programme.desc: Lee usa a tcnica banida, Ltus Primria, para atacar Gaara. A luta parece ter terminado, mas a manobra apenas danifica a proteo feita pela areia de Gaara. Imvel aps de ter usado Ltus Primria, Lee lanado facilmente por toda parte por Gaara.

programme.desc: Lee decide usar a manobra proibida, Ltus Oculta, que libera trs ou mais dos oito portais que possuem a concentrao dos pontos de chakra. Quando os oito portais se abrem, o usurio pode morrer. Mas Gaara responde com seu prprio ataque, Atade de Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A senhora Garrison comea a pensar que est sentindo algo pelo senhor Escravo, mas ele j tem planos de se casar com seu novo amor. Ela decide fazer o possvel para acabar com a lei que permite o matrimnio gay.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman promove o dio na escola contra os meninos com cabelo vermelho, sardas e pele plida, dizendo que eles no tem alma e no sobrevivem ao sol. Kyle, indignado, decide converter ele em um.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os meninos brincam de detetives e fazem um incrvel trabalho resolvendo pequenos mistrios locais. Eles trabalham to bem, que a polcia de South Park d para eles alguns novos casos para resolver.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Todos os homens e meninos de South Park (com exceo de Kyle) se transformam em metrossexuais graas a um programa gay na televiso. Tudo isso incomoda muito o senhor Garrison e o prprio Kyle, que esto dispostos a fazer algo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Aps a enorme quantidade de mortos em acidentes de trnsito envolvendo idosos no volante, a gerao mais jovem de South Park decide tirar as licenas de conduzir de todos eles. Porm, nenhum deles ficar de braos cruzados.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Double Dragon, (1970, Entertainment)

programme.title: Para te Ver Melhor, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Ana e Guillermo se conhecem por acaso e se apaixonam primeira vista, mas aps uma breve conversa, cada um segue seu caminho sem perceber que no trocaram nmeros de telefone.

programme.title: Para te Ver Melhor, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: As famlias recm-chegadas vo se acomodando em seus novos lares no condomnio. Ana e Guillermo descobrem que sero vizinhos, notcia para a qual nenhum dos dois estava preparado.

programme.title: Para te Ver Melhor, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Depois do reencontro, Ana e Guilherme percebem que vivem vidas bem diferentes do que imaginaram, mas sentem o mesmo que na primeira vez em que se viram.

programme.title: Para te Ver Melhor, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Guillermo e Ana decidem no deixar seus respectivos parceiros e no lutar por seu amor, sem imaginar que seria impossvel cumprir essa deciso.

programme.title: Para te Ver Melhor, (1970, Entertainment)

programme.title: Para te Ver Melhor, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Vrias pessoas se mudam para o mesmo prdio, mas nenhum deles imagina o perigo que corre. Um dos vizinhos, aparentemente encantador, coloca cmeras no local para manipul-los e assedi-los como deseja..

programme.desc: Henry Turner is a New York lawyer who needs to win at any cost. But a single gunshot brings Henrys fast-track rise to a dead stop, leaving him incapacitated and with no memory of the life he used to lead.

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape, (1993, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Taking care of Arnie is mostly Gilbert's task, which can be pretty demanding, at least while you are working at the local grocery store.

programme.title: Forces of Nature, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Ben is trying to get to Savannah for his wedding. A seagull flies into the engine as his plane is taking off. All later flights are canceled because of an approaching hurricane, so he hitches a ride in with an attractive woman named Sara.

programme.title: The Beautician and The Beast, (1997, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A New York cosmetologist mistakenly thought to be a science teacher is offered a job to teach the children of an Eastern European dictator.

programme.title: Urban Cowboy, (1980, Romance)

programme.title: Kill The Irishman, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar-winner Christopher Walken, Val Kilmer, and Ray Stevenson star in KILL THE IRISHMAN, the true story of a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970s.

programme.desc: Oscar-winner Christopher Walken, Val Kilmer, and Ray Stevenson star in KILL THE IRISHMAN, the true story of a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970s.

programme.desc: William Devane and Tommy Lee Jones star as two former P.O.W.s out for revenge in this neo-noir action-thriller that Quentin Tarantino cites as one of his favorite films. Written by genre masters Paul Schrader and Heywood Gould. John Flynn directs.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Trade Bait: Part 2
programme.desc: Still shocked by Sylvios Pendulum Summon, Yuya must find his focus if he wants to save his friends from a 100-story drop!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Toying Around: Part 1
programme.desc: The new kid in town drives Yuya bananas when he begs Yuya to be his duel teacher! Unfortunately for Yuya, this blue-haired battler wont give up until Yuya gives in!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Toying Around: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuyas getting schooled by his wannabe student, Sora! Can Yuya turn things around and teach Sora a lesson about winning, or is Yuyas Pendulum power not going to make the grade?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Mr. Mystery
programme.desc: Still steaming from his loss to Yuya, Sylvio looks to get some payback! But when Zuzu steps in to stop his plans, a mysterious stranger comes out of the shadows to show her how its done!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Bad Business
programme.desc: The Leo Institute is looking to take over Yuyas duel school, and theyre bringing 3 of their most dangerous duelists to take down whoever dares stand in their way!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Dueling with the Stars
programme.desc: The battle to save Yuyas duel school goes galactic when Yuya faces off against Leo Institutes Dipper, an out-of-this-world duelist whose interstellar skills could have Yuya seeing stars!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: You Show 'Em
programme.desc: Its a gem of a duel when Zuzu faces a fierce Fusion Summoner whose jewel monsters are a cut above the rest! Can Zuzu and her Divas belt out a victory, or will the Leo Institutes diamond of a duelist force a final face-off?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Going, Going, Gong
programme.desc: Its all up to Gong to save You Show from falling into the hands of the Leo Institute! Can Gong stare down defeat without moving his feet, or will a sword-swinging Syncro Summoner slice and dice his way to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Battle Under the Big Top
programme.desc: Its a battle under the big top, but no ones clowning around! Yuya duels Declan to determine the fate of Yuyas duel school!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Circus Surprise!
programme.desc: Declan has a surprise in store that could swing the duel his way! Can Yuya take down the best the Leo Institute has to offer, or will Declans deck prove to be unbeatable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: The Show Must Go On
programme.desc: Yuyas down in the dumps, but Principal Boyles not having it! Looking to snap Yuya out of his funk, Skip challenges Yuya to a duel to prove that the show must go on!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: In It To Win It
programme.desc: Still stinging from her defeat against the Leo Institute, Zuzu turns to an unlikely source for some assistance Sora! But before her training can commence, a familiar looking stranger shows up, putting her lesson on hold!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Menu Venue: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya is served a heaping helping of culinary catastrophe when he duels a celebrity chef with a menu full of merciless food monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Menu Venue: Part 2
programme.desc: The table is set for a frenzied food fight to the finish! Can Yuya handle what Chef Pepper dishes out, or will he lose a lot more than his appetite?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Trapped in a Card
programme.desc: Its a case of mistaken identity when Yuya is eyed as the primary suspect for attacking Leo students! But when Yuya crosses paths with the real culprit, things go from bad to worse!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Quiz Quagmire: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya matches minds with the quiz whiz extraordinaire Pierre LSuprieure in a duel of wits! Can Yuya outsmart the smartest boy on Earth, or will Yuya end up scratching his head in defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Quiz Quagmire: Part 2
programme.desc: In the finale of the mind-bending match thats part-duel, part-quiz show - one wrong answer could mean curtains for Yuya! Can he outduel and outthink a trivia whiz whos never wrong?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Beyond Belief
programme.desc: Duelists throughout the city are continuously being attacked, and everyone is on the search to find out the who, how and why!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Date With Fate: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuyas future takes a terrifying turn for the worse when he battles a fortunetelling foe who predicts this will be his last duel ever! Can Yuya fix his fate and avoid a devastating disaster, or has his luck finally run out?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Date With Fate: Part 2
programme.desc: As Yuyas battle against the fortunetelling predictress Aura flares to its finish, it becomes crystal clear that Yuyas danger-filled future is becoming a reality!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: For Our Tomorrows
programme.desc: Mysteries are revealed when the masked duelist whos been terrorizing Leo Institute students is confronted and challenged to a battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Battle Between Buddies: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya needs one more win to get into the Championship, but it will be his most difficult battle yet when he discovers he has to beat his best bud Gong in order to move on!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Battle Between Buddies: Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between best buds Yuya and Gong for a spot in the Arc League Championships rages to a friend-zied finish!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Challengers Assemble
programme.desc: Let the games begin! The top duelists from around the globe have gathered together for the Arc League Championships to find out whos the best duelist in the world!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Something Fishy
programme.desc: Allie is looking to make a big splash at the Arc League Championship, but she soon finds herself in over her head! Can Allies deck of fishy friends turn the tides, or will her mysterious opponent sink her chances of winning?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Fusion Foes
programme.desc: Zuzu takes center stage in an epic rematch against Leo Institutes dueling diamond, Julia Krystal! Will Zuzu avenge her earlier loss and walk away a winner, or will history repeat itself and leave Zuzu singing the blues?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Gong the Strong
programme.desc: When Gongs old sparring partner sets a trap for Yuya, the only way Gong can save his friend is to forfeit his duel and get tossed from the tourney!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 1
programme.desc: Sylvio finally has just the thing to take Yuya down a deck full of Pendulum Cards! Could Yuya's days in the spotlight be done for?
programme.sub-title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuya is off his game and on the run as Sylvio zeroes in on zeroing out his life points! If Yuya cant get into the swing of things, this could be his final performance!
programme.sub-title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Making the Cut: Part 1
programme.desc: Sora is psyched to put on a showstopping duel for the fans, but his opponent Shay is set to turn Soras one man show into a no man show!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Making the Cut: Part 2
programme.desc: Sora and Shay's heated duel hits its boiling point when dark secrets about their hidden history come to light! Could there be something sinister behind Soras sweet-toothed smile?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Soras Secrets: Part 1
programme.desc: While Yuto is looking for answers, Sora is looking to get some revenge! But when these two tangle, Yuya finds out more than he ever expected!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Soras Secrets: Part 2
programme.desc: Surprises are in the cards as the battle between Sora and Yuto comes to an unexpected conclusion! But just when Yuya thinks hes seen everything, a new face shows up on the scene that makes Yuya do a triple take!

programme.title: The Akazaya members who were on board Law's Polar Tang finally reach Onigashima and see someone who they didn't expect. Kaido's son Yamato starts telling his story to Luffy, shares his passion, and reveals what's behind his mask!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Desire to be Oden! Yamatos Dream!

programme.title: At the back entrance of Onigashima, the Akazaya members try to get inside the gate, but they're blocked by their former colleague Kanjuro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosive?! The Handcuffs that Shackle Yamatos Freedom!

programme.title: Kaido's plan to obtain the great treasure infuriates Orochi, but his unexpected violent move silences everyone. Meanwhile at the back entrance of Onigashima, Kikunojo squares off against Kanjuro and gets into an emotional fight with her former colleague.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Akazaya Face-off! Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro!

programme.title: The Akazaya members start charging towards Kaido from the back of Onigashima. Meanwhile, at the Performance Floor, Kaido closes in on Momonosuke shivering in terror and asks him the ultimate question which will determine his fate.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Akazaya members deliver a crushing blow to Kaido. Luffy and Yamato try to back them up, but Ulti stands in their way and Big Mom spots Luffy. Meanwhile, Nami and Carrot free themselves from their enemies and move on to take back Zeus!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Onigashima in Tumult! Luffys All-Out War Begins!

programme.title: The Animal Kingdom Pirates gasp with surprise to see thousands of samurai warriors coming into the castle. In his dragon form, Kaido goes outside to fight the Akazaya members under the moon/
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle Under the Moon! The Berserker, Sulong the Moon Lion!

programme.title: Shinobu tries to rescue the weakened Momonosuke but is found by King and attacked. On the other hand, Nami takes back Zeus from Big Mom and runs away but loses him again and gets chased by Zeus who is ordered to kill to her by Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Franky faces Big Mom with the help of Robin and Jimbei, but the Numbers come interrupting their battle. One of them holds Brachio Tank with Usopp and Chopper inside in his hand. Meanwhile, Yamato finally meets his son Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ill Protect You! Yamato Meets Momonosuke!

programme.title: As the Minks struggle with a poor hand against the Gifters, Kin'emon tries to assist them, but Dogstorm and Cat Viper stop him and start fighting for the other Minks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hats Come Together!

programme.title: Who's-Who invites Drake and Hawkins to a plot to kill Queen. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats are facing two large monsters that remind them of the Giant who they once struggled to take down. As Luffy charges towards them, someone unexpected comes in to help.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Risky Invitation! A Plot to Eliminate Queen!

programme.title: Drake vows to fight alongside Luffy, but Zoro becomes skeptical and challenges him to a fight. Meanwhile, Usopp's practical joke pushes Nami into confronting Ulti, who is infuriated since her brother got attacked.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Rivalry! Nami and Ulti!

programme.title: Queen uses a new version of the Plague Bullets which will turn the samurai into ogre-like monsters. Meanwhile, the Minks keep pushing the fight against the Gifters and drive Jack into a corner. However, Kaido stands up for his subordinate.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!

programme.title: While Luffy is hurrying to the rooftop and Yamato is trying to catch up to Momonosuke to protect him, the Akazaya members finally face off against Kaido.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Odens Secret Swordplay!

programme.title: Queen, the Lead Performer, blazes away at samurai on the Performance Floor with the special version of the Plague Rounds, which turns them into hideous ogres that corner Zoro and Drake
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Power of Ice Oni! A New Version of the Plague Rounds!

programme.title: King orders his subordinates to go after Momonosuke. Shinobu tries to protect him, but they are cornered by one of the strong Lead Performers from the Animal Kingdom Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Wont Forgive Him! Choppers Determination!

programme.title: Yamato fights Sasaki and the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division to protect Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Zoro tries to get rid of the Gifters who have turned into Ice Oni, but Queen starts a horrible game which involves the antibody for the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Ulti and Page One of the Tobi Roppo chase Nami and Usopp, after being infuriated by their attack as well as Luffy's declaration of becoming the King of the Pirates. Cornered, Nami gives in and Ulti pushes her to say the unthinkable.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Carrot and Wanda step in to help Marco, who is cornered by Big Mom and Perospero. In the meantime, Yamato fights a fierce battle against the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division led by Sasaki, while protecting Shinobu and Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sasakis Onslaught! Armored Division vs. Yamato!

programme.title: Zoro and Drake continue to chase Apoo to get the antibody against Ice Oni, while Chopper is trying to figure out how to fight the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eliminate the Ice Oni! Choppers Fire Trick!

programme.title: Sanji hears a woman's scream for help and dashes into the room the scream can be heard from. However, it's a trap set up by Black Maria of the Tobi Roppo. Meanwhile, Luffy and Jimbei who are trying to reach the rooftop get help from the unexpected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Its Not Okay! The Spider lures Sanji!

programme.title: While Kaido begins the New Onigashima Project, Marco appears in front of Chopper and the others, who are struggling with Ice Oni. The members of the Tobi Roppo continue to give the Straw Hats a hard time while their former member helps Zoro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that he once confronted a man, who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido's head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Yamatos Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!

programme.title: The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro's way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro's determination and tries to pave the way for him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Marcos Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about how Ace gave him hope for the future. Meanwhile, Luffy and the other allied pirates from the Worst Generation make it to the rooftop to finally face off against Kaido and Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Luffy's strong attack reminds Kaido of all the strong ones he's ever met. On the other hand, Luffy, Law, and Kid keep quarreling amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls "heaven."
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!

programme.title: Luffy pummels Kaido with his well-trained Kong Gatling and delivers a final blow using all his strength. Big Mom tries to fight back, but Law gets in her way and Kid and Killer also try to finish Kaido off.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaido Laughs! The Emperors of the Sea vs. the New Generation!

programme.title: After watching the Straw Hats' departure to Onigashima, Tama wondered if there was anything she could do to help the Straw Hats and the samurai. Now that she's here on Onigashima, it's time to execute her powerful plan Operation Kibi Dango!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Otamas Secret Plan! Operation Kibi Dango!

programme.title: Sanji is captured and tortured by the merciless Black Maria. She names the terms of his release: to turn over one of his crewmates. He hesitates but has no other option. After much distress, he makes a move that surprises everyone.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanjis Scream! An SOS Echoes Over the Island!

programme.title: Robin bursts in to rescue Sanji along with Brook, and faces Black Maria, who is trying to keep Sanji as her pet. Meanwhile, Yamato, Momonosuke, and Shinobu are spotted hiding by the enemy, and they find themselves on the run again.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Chopper works hard to make the cure for Ice Oni, even though he is turning into one himself. Meanwhile, the infected Boss Hyogoro the Flower regains his youth and fights fiercely to protect Chopper and the others.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: No Regrets! Luffy and Boss, a Master-Disciple Bond!

programme.title: Seeing everyone turning into Ice Oni, there is nothing that the samurai warriors can do other than grieve. However, it wasn't just them who were devastated by Queen's raging virus. When their desperation and frustration peak, they hear a hopeful voice.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The wounded Akazaya members are surprised to see Kozuki Oden alive. They were disappointed by their failure to take down Kaido, but now with their lord, they are filled with hope to face their sworn enemy again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Oden Appears! The Confused Hearts of the Akazaya Members!

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A., (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Alias Jesse James, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: In this hilarious western spoof, insurance broker Milford Farnsworth (Bob Hope) unwittingly sells a life insurance policy worth $100,000 to the infamous Jesse James. Now, he has to figure out how to keep the deadliest outlaw in history alive!

programme.title: Pardners, (1956, Drama)
programme.desc: A rich momma's boy returns west with the son of his murdered father's partner to foil a gang trying to gain control of his family ranch. They accidentally clean up the town.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Warlock, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: An ex-outlaw (Richard Widmark) divides and challenges a quick-draw lawman (Henry Fonda) and his sidekick (Anthony Quinn).

programme.title: Heart Of The Rio Grande, (1942, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry tames a spoiled teenage shrew sent to a Dude Ranch for the summer and in the process humanizes her father into being a better parent. Action includes stampeding horses, and a bold rescue!

programme.title: Sunset in Wyoming, (1941, Drama)
programme.desc: Conscientious rancher Gene Autry must save his valley from flooding caused by a lumber company that is stripping the land. Gene hatches a plan to declare the mountain a state park and wildlife shrine.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: Marlon Brando and Jack Nicholson ignite the screen in this rousing story of a wealthy Montana rancher who hires a professional killer to track down a gang of horse thieves.

programme.title: The Kentuckian, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Eli Wakefield (Burt Lancaster) and his son are Kentucky adventurers longing for life on the Texas frontier. They learn, however, that their greatest challenge lies not in the uncharted wilderness, but in the people they meet along the way.

programme.title: Miss Potter, (2006, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Biography of children's author Beatrix Potter, including how she overcame a domineering mother, and the chauvinism of Victorian England, to become a best-selling author.

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: Heist, (2001, Heist Films)
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: Crank, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Today is the last day of hit man Chev Chelios' life. He has been given a poison that will kill him if he allows his heart to settle into a normal rhythm. In order to stay alive and take revenge, Chev must keep his adrenaline elevated by any way possible.

programme.title: Crank 2 High Voltage, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: In this high-octane sequel, hitman Chev Chelios (Statham) launches himself on an electrifying chase through Los Angeles in pursuit of the Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart.

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss.

programme.title: Fanboys, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: A group of Star Wars fans travel to Skywalker Ranch to steal a copy of 'The Phantom Menace,' so that their terminally ill friend can see it before its release in theaters several months down the line.

programme.title: Caado, (2003)
programme.desc: 2003. Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Tommy Lee Jones, Connie Nielsen, Benicio Del Toro, Leslie Stefanson, John Finn, Jos Ziga, Ron Canada, Mark Pellegrino, Jenna Boyd, Aaron DeCone Diretor: William Friedkin

programme.title: Sentinela, (2006)
programme.desc: 2006. Um agente do servio secreto acusado de homicdio precisa limpar seu nome. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Michael Douglas, Kiefer Sutherland, Eva Longoria, Kim Basinger, Martin Donovan, Blair Brown, Kristin Lehman, Raynor Scheine, Ritchie Coster, David Rasche Diretor: Clark Johnson

programme.title: Distrito 13 - Ultimato, (2004)
programme.desc: 2004. Damien e Leito esto retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma misso para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco lderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os servios secretos da cidade tomem medidas drsticas para resolver o problema. Gneros: Crime Elenco: Philippe Torreton, David Belle, Cyril Raffaelli Diretor: Patrick Alessandrin

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2, (2006)
programme.desc: 2006. A romancista Catherine est novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avali-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e atrado para um jogo sedutor. Gneros: Drama Elenco: Sharon Stone, David Morrissey, Charlotte Rampling, David Thewlis, Stan Collymore, Indira Varma, Heathcote Williams, Hugh Dancy, Terence Harvey, Jan Ch... Diretor: Michael Caton-Jones

programme.title: A Fuga, (1994)
programme.desc: 1994. Para sair da priso, um criminoso pede a esposa para negociar sua liberdade com um chefe da mfia. Mas quando o plano d errado, o casal tenta fugir para o Mxico. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Alec Baldwin, Kim Basinger, Michael Madsen, James Woods, David Morse, Jennifer Tilly, James Stephens, Richard Farnsworth, Burton Gilliam, Philip Seymo... Diretor: Roger Donaldson

programme.title: O Matador - Misso Resgate, (2022)
programme.desc: 2022. Quando a garota de quem ele est cuidando sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jang Hyuk, Anne, Bruce Khan, Bang Eun-jung, Lee Seung-joon, Cha Tae-hyun, Son Hyun-joo Diretor: Choi Jae-hoon

programme.title: Cdigo de Honra, (2016)
programme.desc: 2016. Um ex-coronel das foras especiais se torna um vigilante que mata criminosos, enquanto um ex-colega quer det-lo. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, James Russo, Louis Mandylor, Craig Sheffer, Griff Furst, Helena Mattsson, Rafael Petardi, R.D. Call, Michael Flynn, Ileana Huxley Diretor: Michael Winnick

programme.title: Distrito 13 - Ultimato, (2004)
programme.desc: 2004. Damien e Leito esto retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma misso para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco lderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os servios secretos da cidade tomem medidas drsticas para resolver o problema. Gneros: Crime Elenco: Philippe Torreton, David Belle, Cyril Raffaelli Diretor: Patrick Alessandrin

programme.title: Ameaa Explosiva, (2016)
programme.desc: 2016. Depois de uma ameaa de bomba, dois especialistas do FBI mergulham em um jogo mortal de gato e rato com um criminoso, correndo desesperadamente contra o tempo para descobrir o verdadeiro objetivo do homem-bomba, enquanto lutam para salvar sua cidade. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Adam Joseph Copeland, C.j. Perry, Erica Carroll, Julia Benson, Michael Rogers, Mitchell Kummen, Patrick Sabongui Diretor: Stephen Reynolds

programme.title: Endiabrado, (2000)
programme.desc: 2000. Um jovem desesperado para mudar de vida faz um acordo com o Diabo. Gneros: Comedy Elenco: Brendan Fraser, Elizabeth Hurley, Frances OConnor, Frances O'Connor, Paul Adelstein, Brian Doyle-Murray, Jeff Doucette, Miriam Shor, Orlando Jones, Toby Huss Diretor: Harold Ramis

programme.title: Blitz, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Blitz um serial killer de Londres que est matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polcia duro, inflexvel e politicamente incorreto, tero a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Paddy Considine, Aidan Gillen, David Riley Diretor: Elliott Lester, Jordan Hill

programme.title: Dose Dupla, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operao secreta acaba gerando resultados catastrficos. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Denzel Washington, Mark Wahlberg, Paula Patton Diretor: Baltasar Kormkur

programme.title: Alvo Duplo, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Dois caras dures e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vo unir foras para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa no ser nada fcil e muito sangue vai rolar. Gneros: Crime Elenco: Christian, Slater, Stallone, Sylvester Diretor: Walter Hill

programme.title: Demolidor - O Homem sem Medo, (2003)
programme.desc: 2003. Um homem cegado por resduos txicos, que tambm ampliaram os seus outros sentidos, luta contra o crime como um super-heri acrobtico das artes marciais. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Garner, Colin Farrell, Michael Clarke Duncan, Jon Favreau Diretor: Mark Steven Johnson

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3, (2008)
programme.desc: 2008. Frank Martin obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agncia de Proteo Ambiental da Ucrnia, de Marselha a Odessa, alm de dois sacos de contedo suspeito. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Robert Knepper, Natalya Rudakova, Franois Berland, Jeroen Krabb, Alex Kobold, David Atrakchi, Yann Sundberg, Eriq Ebouaney, David Kammenos Diretor: Olivier Megaton

programme.title: Justia Letal, (1969)
programme.desc: 1969. A equipe de Kane (Steven Seagal) enfrenta a Nova Esperana da Nao Ariana enquanto trabalha para influenciar o voto do pblico nas eleies municipais. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Acima da Lei, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. Um ex-mafioso que se tornou empresrio e um detetive da polcia devem lutar com um ex-policial sujo que quer levar o assassino de seu filho justia. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Johnny Messner, Steven Seagal, DMX, Bill Cobbs, Zack Ward, Jeff M Hill, Randy Charach, Kim DeLonghi, Chester Rushing, Sean Kanan Diretor: James Cullen Bressack

programme.title: Redeno, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Jason Statham um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grvida. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Agata Buzek, Jason Statham Diretor: Steven Knight

programme.title: Perseguio Mortal, (2022)
programme.desc: 2022. O ladro realiza o roubo de sua vida quando rouba o traficante psictico, Temple. O plano corre bem at que o ladro descobre um clandestino em seu carro de fuga: a esposa grvida de Temple, Mia. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: James Clayton, Lina Lecompte, Vinnie Jones Diretor: James Clayton

programme.title: Distrito 13 - Ultimato, (2004)
programme.desc: 2004. Damien e Leito esto retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma misso para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco lderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os servios secretos da cidade tomem medidas drsticas para resolver o problema. programme.desc: 2008. programme.title: O Liquidador, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Um guarda-costas altamente qualificado, vingando a morte de seu irmo, descobre um crculo de corrupo que se estende aos mais altos nveis da sociedade e do governo. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Vinnie Jones, Berik Aitzhanov, Sergey Nikonenko Diretor: Akan Satayev

programme.title: Sr. & Sra. Smith, (2005)
programme.desc: 2005. Um casal entediado fica surpreso ao descobrir que ambos so assassinos contratados por agncias rivais para se matarem. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Vince Vaughn, Adam Brody, Kerry Washington, Chris Weitz, Rachael Huntley, Keith David, Michelle Monaghan, Stephanie March Diretor: Doug Liman

programme.title: Assassin's Creed, (2016)
programme.desc: 2016. Callum Lynch explora as memrias de seu ancestral Aguilar Nerha e se torna um Mestre Assassino para enfrentar a sociedade secreta dos Templrios. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Michael Fassbender, Marion Cotillard, Jeremy Irons, Brendan Gleeson, Charlotte Rampling Diretor: Justin Kurzel

programme.title: Centurio, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. O Imprio Romano controla do Egito Espanha, do leste at o Mar Negro. Entretanto ele enfrenta problemas no norte da Gr-Bretanha, devido s tticas de guerrilha usadas por seus inimigos. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Andreas Wisniewski, Axelle Carolyn, Dave Legeno, David Morrissey, Dhaffer L Abidine, Dominic West, Jj Feild, Lee Ross. Diretor: Neil Marshall

programme.title: Ruas Em Guerra, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. Quando o implacvel Lord Rincon e sua gangue MS-13 recrutam Miguel, de 10 anos, para trabalhar como um de seus entregadores de drogas, Lucas, irmo mais velho de Miguel e que tambm trabalha para o bandido, est desesperado para manter o garoto seguro. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jean-Claude Van Damme, David Castaeda, Elijah Rodriguez, Nicholas Sean Johnny, Charlie MacGechan, Joana Metrass, Dean John-Wilson, Jim Caesar, Kerry Bennett, Uriel Emil Pollack Diretor: Lior Geller

programme.title: A Famlia, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Um chefe da mfia e sua famlia so transferidos para uma pacata cidade na Frana sob o programa de proteo a testemunhas depois de delatar a mfia. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Robert De Niro, Tommy Lee Jones, Michelle Pfeiffer Diretor: Luc Besson

programme.title: Uma Doce Vingana, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. Mariagrazia, Chiara e Letizia esto longe de serem confiantes em seus corpos. Na maioria das vezes elas gostariam de ser invisveis. Mas quando um vdeo mostrando as meninas em trajes de banho aparece on-line, seus piores pesadelos se tornam realidade. Gneros: Comedy Elenco: Margherita De Francisco, Giulia Barbuto, Costa Da Cruz Diretor: Francesco Ghiaccio

programme.title: Trs Ladres e Um Beb, (2006)
programme.desc: 2006. Para o compulsivo jogador de Slipper (Jackie Chan), existe apenas uma coisa mais aterrorizante do que os credores - o som do choro de um beb. Mas e se um beb se transforma-se no salvador de suas dvidas? Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jackie Chan, Louis Koo, Michael Hui, Charlene Choi, Yuen Biao, Teresa Carpio, Gao Yuanyuan, Terence Yin, Conroy Chan, Andrew Lin Diretor: Benny Chan

programme.title: O Grande Dave, (2008)
programme.desc: 2008. Tripulao de aliens em miniatura opera uma nave espacial com forma humana. Gneros: Comedy Elenco: Eddie Murphy, Elizabeth Banks, Judah Friedlander, Marc Blucas, Gabrielle Union, Scott Caan, Pat Kilbane, Ed Helms, Kevin Hart, Mike O'Malley Diretor: Brian Robbins

programme.title: Os Espartalhes, (2008)
programme.desc: 2008. Pardia de "300" e outros filmes. O rei Lenidas e seu exrcito de 12 homens lutam contra Xerxes da Prsia para defender a liberdade de Esparta. Gneros: Comedy Elenco: Carmen Electra, Diedrich Bader, Ken Davitian, Kevin Sorbo, Sean Maguire Diretor: Aaron Seltzer, Jason Friedberg

programme.title: A Justiceira, (2014)
programme.desc: 2014. Ela uma professora antiquada, que inspira os alunos de uma cidadezinha. Mas eles no sabem que o passatempo favorito dela fazer justia com as prprias mos. Gneros: Comedy Elenco: Katie Holmes, James Badge Dale, Callan Mulvey Diretor: Karen Leigh Hopkins

programme.title: Papai Noel as Avessas 2, (2016)
programme.desc: 2016. O ganancioso Willie vive com dio e base de whisky barato. Ele se junta, mais uma vez, com seu companheiro, o irritado Marcus, para tentar acabar com uma instituio de caridade que fica em Chicago, na vspera de Natal. programme.desc: 1970. Um criminoso de guerra procurado mundo afora conhece uma empregada e um estranho relacionamento surge entre eles. Quando a calmaria parece estabelecida na vida dele, ela descobre que h uma recompensa milionria para quem souber onde o fugitivo est. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Caador de Demnios, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O caador de demnios Jebediah Woodley viaja at uma pequena cidade ao sul do Mississippi na expectativa de enfrentar um demnio. Quando a entidade maligna acidentalmente libertada, ela comea a possuir e matar os moradores da regio. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Trfico de Mulheres, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Trs jovens mulheres, da Amrica, da Nigria e da ndia, so vtimas do trfico de mulheres, sendo escravizadas para a prtica de prostituio. O lucro pode ser de centenas de bilhes de dlares anualmente, superando o das maiores empresas do mundo. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Sobre Amor. Somente para Adultos, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Homens e mulheres procuram por amor, sexo e alguma cura para o tdio em Moscou. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: O Dono da Festa, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Van Wilder ficou famoso na cidade por organizar as melhores festas da faculdade. Porm, o veterano forado a mudar sua rotina de sete anos aps perder a mesada do pai, deixando as festividades com os dias contados. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Um Lobo em Pele de Cordeiro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Em uma terra mgica, em um prado calmo onde ovelhas podem viver sem preocupaes, problemas comeam a aparecer quando um grupo de lobos est instalado nas proximidades. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Alex Rider Contra o Tempo, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Alex Rider, adolescente britnico habilidoso em lingustica, mergulho, artes marciais e tiro, recrutado pelo MI6. Sua primeira misso investigar o bilionrio Darrius Sayle, que fez suspeitas doaes de mega computadores s escolas da Inglaterra. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, a dona de casa Bridget forada a assumir um trabalho como auxiliar de limpeza na Casa da Moeda em Kansas City, Missouri, e acaba planejando o roubo de uma fortuna em notas gastas destinadas destruio. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Minha Vida de Cachorro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Nos anos 1950, Ingemar enviado para parentes no interior da Sucia devido doena de sua me. Inicialmente com dificuldades de adaptao e saudades da famlia, ele acaba vivendo experincias marcantes para toda sua vida. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: A Eterna Namorada, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Big Stone Gap o lar de personagens charmosos e excntricos. Ave Maria Mulligan, uma farmacutica de 35 anos, a solteirona da cidade. A vida de Ave vira de cabea para baixo depois que ela descobre um segredo de famlia. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: As Duas Faces de Janeiro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Chester e Colette decidem fazer uma viagem de barco Grcia. No local, eles conhecem Rydal, um guia americano que fala grego e decide ajud-los. O que eles no sabem que Rydal conhecido por aplicar golpes nos turistas. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Relaes de Famlia, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um homem que se sente enterrado sob uma montanha de dvidas cria uma ligao inesperada com um jovem em uma agncia de cobrana enquanto ambos lutam para se libertar de dvidas, tanto financeiras quanto emocionais. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Vale dos Deuses, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. A abundncia contrasta com a pobreza em trs narrativas separadas, apresentando um escritor de classe mdia, um trilionrio excntrico e uma comunidade Navajo em dificuldades. Gneros: Drama

programme.desc: 2008. Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento - T02E55
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final! programme.sub-title: Uma Sombra Na Escurido: O Perigo Se Aproxima De Sasuke
programme.desc: 2020. No ltimo combate das preliminares, Choji luta contra o capanga de Orochimaru, Dosu. As preliminares finalmente terminam, e o Hokage revela a terceira prova, enquanto Orochimaru comea secretamente seu plano maligno. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: Ebisu Volta: O Treinamento Mais Duro De Naruto - T01E52
programme.sub-title: Ebisu Volta: O Treinamento Mais Duro De Naruto
programme.desc: 2020. Na preparao para a terceira prova, Kakashi escolhe Ebisu para treinar Naruto. Ebisu diz a Naruto que ele ainda no controla seu chakra o suficiente e o faz caminhar sobre gua. Naruto aprende rpido e impressiona Ebisu. Ento, uma figura aparece... Gneros: Anime

programme.desc: 2020. Jiraiya, um dos Sannin lendrios, aparece de repente diante de Ebisu e Naruto. Naruto d a Jiraiya o apelido de "Sbio Tarado". Gneros: Anime

programme.sub-title: Jutsu De Invocao : A Sabedoria Do Sbio Do Sapo!
programme.desc: 2020. O ninja do Som, Dosu, aparece diante de Gaara e pretende derrot-lo, mas o oposto acontece. Um jonin da Aldeia da Areia e Kabuto os observam secretamente. Gneros: Anime

programme.sub-title: Um Sentimento De Anseio, Uma Flor Cheia De Esperana
programme.desc: 2020. Naruto continua seu treino com Jiraiya para dominar o Jutsu de Invocao, que chama vrias criaturas selvagens. Mas ele tem dificuldades em controlar o Chacra da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: 2001. Tyson Granger percebe que est atrasado para uma batalha de Beyblade com Andrew, o melhor Beyblader da cidade. Antes que Tyson chegue l, um Blade Shark chamado Carlos luta e o derrota, pegando sua lmina. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E01

programme.title: 2001. Tyson rapidamente perde sua batalha com Kai. Andrew e Kenny informam que os Blade Sharks esto procurando o melhor Bit Beast que ningum pode vencer. Andrew, Kenny e Tyson reconstroem o Bey de Tyson. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E02

programme.title: 2001. Tyson e Kenny conhecem Max, o garoto novo da cidade, pouco antes de um filhote ser levado para uma cachoeira. Tyson tenta salv-lo, mas falha. Max ento tenta e consegue. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E03

programme.title: 2001. O torneio regional de qualificao da Beyblade comea quando Tyson, Max e at Kenny entram para ver se conseguem destronar Kai, o atual campeo. Max ganha seu bloco e avana para a final. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E04

programme.title: 2001. Nas semifinais, Max enfrenta Kai, o campeo. Tyson espera lutar com Ray, um invicto Blader. O prato baseado como uma torre, para ficar no topo por 10 segundos como voc ganha. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E05

programme.title: 2001. A batalha final das semifinais Tyson contra Ray, um invicto Blader. Kenny est trabalhando em algo e no est l na primeira rodada. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E06

programme.title: 2001. Tyson, Max e Kenny esto trabalhando em Dragoon para garantir a vitria nas finais quando o vov interrompe e revela a Tyson que seu 13 aniversrio! Aps a festa, a primeira rodada termina rapidamente, com Tyson derrotando Kai inesperadamente. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E07

programme.title: 2001. Enquanto Tyson, Kai, Max, Kenny e Ray voam para Hong Kong para se preparar para o torneio asitico, Kai "sai" do time e caminha pelas ruas. O resto da equipe tenta segui-lo e falha quando ouvem um Bey girando. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E08

programme.title: 2001. Kevin discorda dos BladeBreakers especialmente Ray e desafia Ray para uma batalha. Tyson j teve o suficiente e luta com Kevin, mas ele cai rapidamente na capacidade do Bey de balanar e se multiplicar. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E09

programme.title: 2001. O Torneio Asitico BBA est em andamento, no auge de uma torre inacreditavelmente alta na China. programme.title: 2002. O youkai morcego tenta destruir a aldeia junto com a me de Shiori. Inuyasha bloqueado pela barreira da menina e no consegue derrot-lo. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: O Tessaiga Vermelha que Quebra a Barreira
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E20

programme.title: 2002. A tribo youkais Gatos do Fogo ataca do oeste. Seu objetivo obter os fragmentos da Jia de Agome, bem como se vingar de Sesshomaru e Inuyasha, filhos do grande co youkai. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: A Conspirao dos Quatro Youkais Gatos de Fogo
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E21

programme.title: 2002. Inuyasha corta a barreira e junto com o Kuga, eles entram no castelo. Enquanto isso, Mirok e Sango caram sob um feitio, e Agome est presa em uma priso. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: Os Alvos so Sesshomaru e Inuyasha
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E22

programme.title: 2002. O Rei Pantera, o general da tribo Pantera, comea a se mover com o poder da Jia. Inuyasha e Sesshomaru atacam a mmia. Enquanto isso, Kuga, Mirok e os outros levam Agome e os outros para um local seguro. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: Os Gatos de Fogo e a Espada de Dois Caninos
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E23

programme.title: 2002. Sango convidada a matar um youkai por um jovem senhor chamado Kuranosuke, que se apaixonou por ela seis anos atrs. Kuranosuke tem aparncia, status e riqueza. Sango est confusa sobre como ela recusar sua proposta de casamento. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E24

programme.title: 2002. A Tessaiga est equipada com uma tcnica que pode romper barreiras. Jaken planeja roub-la de Inuyasha, mas seus planos fracassam continuamente. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: O Plano de Jaken para Roubar Tessaiga
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E25

programme.title: 2002. Narak diz a Sesshomaru que ele devolver Rin se ele matar Inuyasha, mas Sesshomaru se recusa e vai at o castelo dele. Enquanto isso, Agome detecta a presena da Jia. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: Sesshomaru e o Sequestro de Rin
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E26

programme.title: 2002. Narak est tentando absorver Sesshomaru para que ele possa obter os poderes de um youkai completo. Mas Inuyasha rompe sua barreira e interfere. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E27

programme.title: 2002. Agome retorna aos dias atuais. Ela est ocupada se preparando para um simulado de dois dias. Enquanto isso, Sango est preocupada com Kohaku, que foi levado por Kagura. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: A Conexo Entre o Presente e a poca das Guerras

programme.title: 2002. Ayame, uma youkai loba, aparece diante de Kuga e diz a ele que sua noiva. Mas Kuga loucamente apaixonado por Agome. Em sua fuga, Kuga encontra o castelo de Narak. Ayame vai atrs dele e atacada por um youkai. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki

Kuga luta para proteger Agome e Ayame. programme.sub-title: A Proposta de Casamento Super Veloz

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T04E06

programme.title: 2002. Em uma certa aldeia, Inuyasha e sua equipe esto cercados por aldees que no gostam de Mirok. Quando eles perguntam por que, eles dizem que Mirok tem feito muitas ms aes. programme.title: 2002. Inuyasha e sua equipe se encontram com Izumo, que est investigando o segredo da criao da Jia. Eles ouvem que um youkai apareceu e vo investigar uma aldeia prxima. programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T04E16

programme.title: The Visitor (2022)
programme.desc: When Robert and his wife move to her childhood home, he discovers an old portrait in the attic of a man who looks just like him. He soon travels down a frightening rabbit hole as he tries to discover the true identity of his mysterious doppelgnger.

programme.title: French Girl (2024)
programme.desc: When his girlfriend gets swept away to Canada by a job offer from her ex, a hopeless romantic travels to her hometown, only to find himself out of his depth while trying to charm her hard-to-impress, French-speaking family.

programme.title: High Noon (1952)
programme.desc: On the verge of retirement, a marshal (Gary Cooper) stands alone to face a vengeful gunman and his gang.

programme.title: Big Jake (1971)
programme.desc: A ranchers (John Wayne) wife (Maureen OHara) summons him home to hunt down the outlaw (Richard Boone) and gang who kidnapped his grandson.

programme.title: Lilies of the Field (1963)
programme.desc: A traveling laborer teaches English to a group of German-speaking nuns while building a chapel for their community.

programme.title: Madeas Big Happy Family (2011)
programme.desc: Madea gathers the clan together to help her niece cope with some distressing news about her health.

programme.title: Madeas Witness Protection (2012)
programme.desc: Placed under federal protection in Madeas Southern home, a Wall Street banker and his dysfunctional family get a taste of the no-nonsense matriarchs special brand of tough love.

programme.title: Boo! A Madea Halloween (2016)
programme.desc: Cranky, fast-talking Madea (Tyler Perry) finds herself under attack from ghosts, ghouls and zombies after breaking up a fraternitys Halloween party.

programme.title: The Pink Panther (1963)
programme.desc: Clumsy Inspector Jacques Clouseau (Peter Sellers) chases a jewel thief (David Niven) and his nephew (Robert Wagner).

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark (1964)
programme.desc: Clumsy Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) visits a nudist camp to prove a French maid (Elke Sommer) innocent of murder.

programme.title: The Return of the Pink Panther (1975)
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Pink Panther (1975)
programme.desc: Bungling Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) once again seeks the Pink Panther diamond and maddens his boss (Herbert Lom).

programme.title: The Pink Panther Strikes Again (1976)
programme.desc: Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) is on the trail of his ex-boss (Herbert Lom), who is out to destroy the world.

programme.title: Revenge of the Pink Panther (1978)
programme.desc: Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) tracks a French drug kingpin with the help of disguises and his quarrys ex-mistress (Dyan Cannon).

programme.title: Curse of the Pink Panther (1983)
programme.desc: Interpol sends the worlds worst detective (Ted Wass) to find French police inspector Jacques Clouseau.

programme.title: Lady Chatterleys Lover (1981)
programme.desc: D.H. Lawrences novel inspired this story of the wife of a paraplegic English aristocrat who takes a lover.

programme.title: The Fortune Cookie (1966)
programme.desc: A TV cameraman hurt while covering a football game is told by his brother-in-law how to get a big insurance settlement.

programme.title: The Hospital (1971)
programme.desc: The suicidal chief surgeon (George C. Scott) of a New York hospital beds the daughter (Diana Rigg) of a mad patient (Barnard Hughes).

programme.title: This is Christmas (2022)
programme.desc: Following Adam and Emma on their daily commute from the village of Langton to London, where they meet the same passengers every day.

programme.title: Annie Hall (1977)
programme.desc: A New York comedian (Woody Allen) recalls his lost love, a kooky singer (Diane Keaton) with a style all her own.

programme.title: A Guy Thing (2003)
programme.desc: After his bachelor party, a man (Jason Lee) wakes up in bed with his fiancees (Selma Blair) cousin (Julia Stiles), a dancer at the bash.

programme.title: Be Cool (2005)
programme.desc: Chili Palmer (John Travolta) runs afoul of music-industry players when he teams up with a friends widow (Uma Thurman) to produce a singers debut album.

programme.title: He Said, She Said (1991)
programme.desc: After they split up, a newspaper reporter and a woman journalist each talk about their romance and becoming a Baltimore TV team.

programme.title: Forces of Nature (1999)
programme.desc: A bridegroom (Ben Affleck) hurries by plane to his wedding, but he and his seatmate (Sandra Bullock) must find other modes of travel.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days (2003)
programme.sub-title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days (2003)
programme.desc: A columnist (Kate Hudson) tries to make a man (Matthew McConaughey) dump her, but he bets his boss that she will fall in love.

programme.title: Shes All That (1999)
programme.desc: A cool teen (Freddie Prinze Jr.) bets a friend that he can transform the schools geekiest girl (Rachael Leigh Cook) into a prom queen.

programme.title: The Terminal (2004)
programme.desc: Unauthorized to enter the United States, an Eastern European (Tom Hanks) befriends a flight attendant (Catherine Zeta-Jones) while living in a New York airport.

programme.title: Torn Hearts (2022)
programme.desc: A country music duo seek out the private mansion of their idol and end up in a twisted series of horrors that force them to confront the limits theyd go for their dreams.

programme.title: Man of the West (1958)
programme.desc: A reformed Texas outlaw (Gary Cooper), a con man and a singer (Julie London) meet the outlaws old gang.

programme.title: Gang Related (1997)
programme.desc: Two corrupt homicide cops selling narcotics accidentally kill an undercover DEA agent and try to pin the murder on a homeless alcoholic, but the dead mans partner comes calling.

programme.title: Sidewalks of New York (2001)
programme.desc: A television producer (Edward Burns), a teacher (Rosario Dawson), a musician, a waitress, a dentist and a real estate agent deal with rocky romances.

programme.title: The Perfect Match (2016)
programme.desc: Complications arise when a lifelong playboy (Terrence J) bets his friends that he can date the same woman (Cassie Ventura) for one month without falling in love.

programme.title: Blame It on Rio (1983)
programme.desc: A middle-aged coffee broker (Michael Caine) eyes his partners (Joseph Bologna) nubile teenage daughter (Michelle Johnson) on vacation in Brazil.

programme.title: The Fire Inside (2024)
programme.desc: The story of Claressa "T-Rex" Shields, a boxer from Flint, Mich., who trained to become the first woman in her countrys history to win an Olympic gold medal in the sport.

programme.title: Nebraska (2013)
programme.desc: A man accompanies his aging, cantankerous father on a long road trip from Billings, Mont., to Lincoln, Neb., to claim a cash prize that might not actually exist.

programme.title: Lenny (1974)
programme.desc: 1950s comic Lenny Bruce (Dustin Hoffman) spurs controversy with his drug use, graphic language and marriage to a stripper (Valerie Perrine).

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda (2004)
programme.desc: Hutu Paul Rusesabagina saves more than 1,200 Tutsi refugees from genocide by hiding them at his posh hotel in Rwandas capital city.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October (1990)
programme.desc: Moscow, Washington and a CIA analyst (Alec Baldwin) track a renegade Soviet captain (Sean Connery) and his new submarine.

programme.title: Bitchin: The Sound and Fury of Rick James
programme.desc: A raw and intimate documentary look at the wildly colorful life of legendary funk artist Rick James; original interviews with artists, collaborators and friends.

programme.title: American Dream/American Knightmare (2018)
programme.desc: The life and exploits of Suge Knight, the co-founder of Death Row Records, and his influence on a highly influential era in music.

programme.title: Norbit (2007)
programme.desc: Though married to a terrible shrew, a man (Eddie Murphy) tries to figure out a way to be with his childhood sweetheart (Thandie Newton), who has just moved back into town.

programme.title: South Park: Bigger, Longer and Uncut (1999)
programme.sub-title: South Park: Bigger, Longer and Uncut (1999)
programme.desc: Kyle, Stan and Cartman orchestrate a resistance to an imminent war between Canada and the United States.

programme.title: Jackass 3 (2010)
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville, Bam Margera, Steve-O and their fearless and foolhardy friends perform outrageous pranks and stunts, including "Sweatsuit Cocktail" and "Beehive Tetherball."

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe (2016)
programme.desc: When father and son coroners investigate the death of a beautiful "Jane Doe," they find increasingly bizarre clues.

programme.title: The Haunting (1999)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: The Last Manhunt (2022)
programme.desc: In 1909 Willie Boy and his love, Carlota, go on the run after he accidentally shoots her father in a confrontation gone terribly wrong. With President Taft coming to the area, the local sheriff leads two Native American trackers to hunt them down.

programme.title: Fatman (2020)
programme.desc: After receiving a lump of coal in his stocking, a disgruntled 12-year-old hires a highly skilled assassin to kill Santa Claus.

programme.title: The Martian (2015)
programme.desc: Left behind by his crew, a stranded astronaut must find a way to survive on Mars, while NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home.

programme.title: The Survivalist (2021)
programme.desc: A year and a half after the fall of civilization due to a viral outbreak, a former FBI agent is forced to protect a young woman immune to the disease from a dangerous gang leader hunting her.

programme.title: Barrons Cove (2024)
programme.desc: A man with a violent past kidnaps the boy he holds responsible for his sons death. As he grows closer to uncovering the truth, hes left to wonder whether his pursuers are really seeking to protect the boy, or merely the secrets he keeps.

programme.title: Shaft (2000)
programme.desc: A detective (Samuel L. Jackson) and a narcotics cop (Vanessa L. Williams) track a sociopath out to kill a woman who can testify that he committed murder.

programme.title: Southpaw (2015)
programme.desc: After losing everything to a senseless tragedy, a boxer (Jake Gyllenhaal) turns to a retired fighter (Forest Whitaker) for guidance as he struggles toward redemption.

programme.title: The Martian (2015)
programme.desc: Left behind by his crew, a stranded astronaut must find a way to survive on Mars, while NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home.

programme.title: Changing Lanes (2002)
programme.desc: An attorney and a recovering alcoholic have a car accident which swiftly escalates into an ongoing, bitter feud.

programme.title: Paid in Full (2002)
programme.desc: A dry cleaners delivery boy becomes one of the most powerful drug dealers in 1980s Harlem. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Fight or Flight (2024)
programme.desc: A mercenary takes on the job of tracking a high-value asset known only as "The Ghost" on an international flight. Realizing the plane is filled with assassins assigned to kill them both, the pair must work together in a fight for their lives.

programme.title: Sexipede (2017)
programme.desc: Beautiful women make your erotic dreams come true.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn (1996)
programme.desc: Desperado brothers (George Clooney, Quentin Tarantino) kidnap a preacher (Harvey Keitel) and his kids, commandeer their RV and wind up in a Mexican strip joint where vampires lurk.

programme.title: Eagle Eye (2008)
programme.desc: Two strangers (Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan) become pawns of a mysterious woman who threatens their friends and family and uses technology to control their actions.

programme.title: Wildcat (2021)
programme.desc: A captive reporter must figure out a way to escape from the militants who ambushed her convoy in the Middle East.

programme.title: The Contractor (2022)
programme.desc: When his new assignment goes awry, an elite soldier finds himself hunted and on the run, caught in a dangerous conspiracy and fighting to stay alive long enough to get home and uncover the true motives of those who betrayed him.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: A lieutenant colonel and approximately 400 U.S. troops battle 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers in 1965.

programme.title: The Running Man (1987)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV hosts (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: Disturbia (2007)
programme.desc: Under house arrest, a troubled youth (Shia LaBeouf) is unsure if his neighbor (David Morse) is really a serial killer or if his suspicions are the result of a captive and overactive imagination.

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Patriots Day (2016)
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings, police Sgt. Tommy Saunders, FBI Special Agent Richard DesLauriers and Commissioner Ed Davis join survivors, first responders and other investigators in a race against time to find the suspects.

programme.title: Event Horizon (1997)
programme.desc: A spaceship missing for seven years finally re-emerges and sends out a distress signal. But when a team is sent out to investigate, they discover that something sinister has taken over the craft.

programme.title: Equilibrium (2002)
programme.desc: In the future a government agent (Christian Bale) and a band of rebels battle a regime that uses a drug to suppress peoples emotions.

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Undisputed (2002)
programme.desc: An undefeated world-champion prizefighter, who is convicted of rape and sent to prison, must confront and fight the reigning prison boxing champion.

programme.title: The Contractor (2022)
programme.desc: When his new assignment goes awry, an elite soldier finds himself hunted and on the run, caught in a dangerous conspiracy and fighting to stay alive long enough to get home and uncover the true motives of those who betrayed him.

programme.title: Cop Land (1997)
programme.desc: The sheriff (Sylvester Stallone) of a small New Jersey police community confronts key men (Harvey Keitel, Ray Liotta) on both sides of a law-enforcement cover-up.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Wolves (2016)
programme.desc: A talented high school basketball players (Taylor John Smith) dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his hard-drinking fathers (Michael Shannon) compulsive gambling.

programme.title: Switchback (1997)
programme.desc: A college student (Jared Leto) and a former rail worker (Danny Glover) are suspects in an FBI agents (Dennis Quaid) hunt for a serial killer who abducted his son.

programme.title: Trading Places (1983)
programme.desc: Sporting billionaire brothers reverse the roles of a Wall Street commodities broker (Dan Aykroyd) and a street hustler (Eddie Murphy).

programme.title: Gangs of New York (2002)
programme.desc: During the era of Tammany Halls sway, a young man (Leonardo DiCaprio) vows vengeance on the vicious gangster (Daniel Day-Lewis) who killed his father.
